comments.body: According to the Material mocks, the * should be red when the field doesn't have a value (even when the label is another colour). We didn't support this before, but it's something worth bearing in mind. Maybe a reason to take a Text here or something.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +148,152 @@                    decoration: const InputDecoration(
                      hintText: 'How do you log in?',
                      labelText: 'New Password *',
                    ),
                    obscureText: true,

comments.body: Note: lines 111-114 are the only non-indent change in this file.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +112,116 @@        top: false,
        bottom: false,
        child: new Form(
          key: _formKey,
          autovalidate: _autovalidate,
